title: IBM Cloud Schematics docs
introduction: Explore the capabilities of IBM Cloud Schematics. You can get started with deploying platform services by using Schematics workspaces, and automating cloud operations with Schematics actions. Learn more about how Schematics works and the benefits of using the service.

section_recommended.title: Deploy cloud services with workspaces
section_recommended.description: Use an IBM-provided Terraform template to create an Object Storage service instance to persistently store your data in IBM Cloud.

section_recommended.title: Automate cloud operations with actions
section_recommended.description: Learn how to automatically start and stop a Virtual Servers for VPC instance with an IBM-provided Ansible playbook.

section_recommended.title: Explore the IBM Cloud software catalog
section_recommended.description: Try out one of the IBM-provided software templates to quickly spin up a classic virtual server instance (VSI), and automatically configure the instance to connect to an IBM Cloud Database.

section_recommended.title: Learn more about Schematics
section_recommended.description: Learn about how Schematics works, integrated open source technologies, and the benefits of using the service.

section_recommended.title: Browse Terrafom templates
section_recommended.description: Explore the sample Terraform templates, onboard them to your private catalogs, and try them using Schematics.

section_recommended.title: Set up the Schematics CLI
section_recommended.description: Install the Schematics CLI plug-in to automate Schematics actions in your IBM Cloud account.
